tiles.heading: Epic battles...
tiles.body: Every opponent is different! Battle through a vast array of unique enemies and hoard the rewards that they may bear upon you!

tiles.heading: Build a legend!
tiles.body: You chose your path, decide what is worthy of your glory and craft the ultimate hero!

tiles.heading: Completely free!
tiles.body: There are absolutely no charges for playing, fun awaits at no cost the way it should be!

tiles.heading: A sci-fi universe!
tiles.body: Based in the coarse blackened void of Zhyithal lies three core species; the Kruvat, brutal warriors filled with determination; the Tiekkot, unionised tough constructed defenders; and the Zhial, a mysterious and lonely kind but beholders of the unknown. The planets are torn, restoration to Zhyithal is needed.

tiles.heading: Cloud save enabled
tiles.body: Don't worry about losing your character cloud saves allow you resume play and continue on different devices
